title: Remart
subtitle: A product resell React App
description: Authentication and authorization Implemented for admin, seller & buyer roles by Firebase & JWT token
Sellers can manage, and advertise their products. They can take payment by stripe
Admin can verify a seller for the blue tick and manage buyer reports, and all buyer's & sellers' accounts.
technology: React JS, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase, Stripe, Tailwind, daisyui, JWT, Tanstack.

title: Consultio
subtitle: A visa consultancy React App
description: Authentication by Email password & social login using Firebase.
Add Service & reviews only for logged-in Users using React, Express JS, MongoDB & Context API.
JWT token authorization for managing my reviews (Edit, Delete).
technology: React JS, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase, Tailwind, daisyui, JWT, dotenv, cors.

title: EDUAID
subtitle: An educational React App
description: Dynamically course loaded, filtering by categories & type using React, Express JS & MongoDB.
Dynamic course details route & download course PDF using react to PDF & React router.
Private Checkout route forcing to login & authenticate by Firebase, React router & Context API
technology: React JS, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase, Bootstrap, cors.
